widgets.title: Agent Health Status
widgets.query: customEvents | where name == 'Agent_Activity' | summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 5m)

widgets.title: Cosmos DB RU Consumption
widgets.query: customEvents | where name == 'CosmosDB_Operation' | summarize avg(customMeasurements.requestCharge) by bin(timestamp, 1m)

widgets.title: OpenAI Token Usage
widgets.query: customEvents | where name == 'OpenAI_API_Call' | summarize sum(customMeasurements.tokensUsed) by model

widgets.title: Conversation Volume
widgets.query: customEvents | where name == 'User_Conversation' | summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 10m)

widgets.title: Error Analysis
widgets.query: exceptions | summarize count() by problemId, outerMessage | top 10 by count_
